column2: title=Regional Cooking from Middle-earth: Recipes of the Third Age

column1: '''''Regional Cooking from Middle-earth: Recipes of the Third Age''''' is a cookbook inspired by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Middle-earth]],<ref>[http://www.amazon.com/Regional-Cooking-Middle-earth-Recipes-Third/dp/155395257X/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1324920234&sr=8-1 Regional Cooking from Middle-earth: Recipes of the Third Age] at [http://www.amazon.com/ref=gno_logo Amazon.com] (accessed 26 December 2011)</ref> containing 111 sections of recipes.<ref>[http://forums.theonering.com/viewtopic.php?t=93660 Regional Cooking From Middle-earth] at [http://forums.theonering.com/index.php Forums.TheOneRing.com] (accessed 26 December 2011)</ref>
